game.name: Hollow Host
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Hollow Host is a horror game with roguelike elements where you are chased by an intelligent creature. Explore the dangerous hellscape, control corpses with special abilities and do try escaping damnation.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hollow Host is a horror game with roguelike elements where you are chased by an intelligent creature. Explore the dangerous hellscape, control corpses with special abilities and do try escaping damnation.
